entities.name: feast
entities.description: The feast is mentioned as a potential event that might happen if they don't drown.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is traditionally responsible for taking first years across the lake to the castle.

entities.name: hogwarts castle
entities.description: The location where students are transported by Hagrid.

entities.name: lake
entities.description: The body of water that the students must cross to reach Hogwarts Castle.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who expresses her reluctance to cross the lake in bad weather.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student who is part of the group that crosses the lake with Hagrid.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a student who is part of the group that crosses the lake with Hagrid.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is part of the group that crosses the lake with Hagrid.

entities.name: station
entities.description: The location where the students board the horseless carriages.

entities.name: carriages
entities.description: The mode of transportation used by the students to reach Hogwarts Castle.

relationships.description: Hagrid is responsible for transporting first years across the lake to Hogwarts Castle.
Hermione expresses her reluctance to cross the lake in bad weather.
Harry boards a horseless carriage at the station.
Ron boards a horseless carriage at the station.
Neville boards a horseless carriage at the station.
